title: Bao Chong Huojian Che Zhi Che Wang Zhi Zhan
title_japanese: 爆冲火箭车之车王之战
synopsis: Halfway through the schedule, the challenge continues. With the increasing difficulty of the track, Chi Xiaofei and its partners are also faced with speed upgrades, technology upgrades, equipment upgrades and mental training. In the face of the heavy clock track, the pendulum track with yellow sand in the sky, the Libra track with high temperature lava, and the quadrupole track with lightning and thunder, Chi Xiaofei and his partners formulated strategies, adjusted their mentality, and successfully challenged. At the summit of Mount Holy Wheel, Chi Xiaofei and the King of Cars launched the ultimate competition. Everyone's support allowed him to gain inner strength and eventually surpass the speed of sound and defeat the king of cars. Destiny is not made by others, but created by oneself. Chi Xiaofei and his partners experienced the "seven tracks" and learned courage, self-confidence, persistence, planning, wisdom, trust, and self. In the end, in control of their own destiny, they will continue to challenge the next miracle! (translated from iqiyi)
